md:
giải nghĩa từ "paternal" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Paternal (adjective)
	+ Meaning: of or relating to a father or fatherhood
	+ Vietnamese: cha, cha mẹ
	+ Example sentence: "He has a paternal instinct to protect his children."
	+ Related words: fatherly, paternalism, paternity
	+ Antonyms: maternal

* Paternal (noun)
	+ Meaning: a person's father or father figure
	+ Vietnamese: cha, người cha
	+ Example sentence: "He looked up to his paternal as a role model."
	+ Related words: father, paternal figure, patriarch
	+ Antonyms: maternal figure

Note: The word "paternal" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. In general, it refers to something related to a father or fatherhood, but it can also refer to a person's father or father figure.
